knimeNode.name: Wait...
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node waits for a certain time, to a certain time or for a file event.

fullDescription.intro:
This node waits for a certain time, to a certain time or for a file event.
This node was kindly sponsored by the Vernalis.
fullDescription.option: The node waits for the entered time (HH:mm:ss).
The node waits until the entered daytime has passed. If the entered daytime has already passed the node executes immediately.
The node waits until the selected file either gets created, modified or deleted.
